name: Lightmeter
headline: Managed Sales Email Delivery For Cold Outreach
description: Lightmeter is turn-key email outreach infrastructure for startups, combining network, platform, and expert advice. It integrates with sales tools like Apollo, replacing Google and Microsoft for email delivery. No change in tooling or workflow required. Lightmeter gets mail into inboxes, scalably and sustainably, while transparently reporting on performance. Plans from 50 to 7,500 outreach emails per day.

founders.name: Sam Tuke, Founder
founders.description: Sam Tuke is Founder and CEO of Lightmeter, the sales email delivery platform. He founded his first Open Source software business age 17, shipping Linux computers he assembled himself. From 2015-2019 he was CEO of phpList, the Open Source Mailchimp alternative, building a base of 10k SaaS customers, and sending 28 bn emails yearly. In 2019 he created mailserver automation app Lightmeter, and two years later used it to launch the first dedicated sales email delivery service of the same name.

#  Turn-key Outreach Infrastructure 
Get your email outreach deliverability managed by experts for scalable, sustainable, sales success. 
[ Book Call ](https://lightmeter.io/<https:/calendly.com/sam-tuke/intro-web/>)
Product 
##  Solve deliverability differently 
![Illustration of a butler serving up a cloud server, an email in transit, and a wrench](https://lightmeter.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/LIGHTMETERx3Managed-delivery.png)
Say Hello to Managed Delivery. 
Self-service tools and DIY Delivery lag behind black-box algorithms and conflicting advice. Get an accountable partner to power sales success. 
![Illustration of a car having it's old GMail engine replaced with a powerful new Lightmeter engine](https://lightmeter.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/LIGHTMETERx3Replace-Gsuite.png)
Replace GSuite for sending outreach emails. 
Lightmeter is a sales-only email delivery network, independent of Google, Microsoft and SendGrid. Built on our own unique mailserver product. 
![Illustration of a protective shield provided by Lightmeter to the different roles within a company, protecting their emails from going to spam](https://lightmeter.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/LIGHTMETERx3Protect-office-email.png)
Protect office email from ever going to spam. 
Outreach with confidence, without getting your work mail suspended or go to spam. We isolate your sales sending, safeguarding other teams.
